hero.title: we shape the unseen

services.description: We build the unseen frameworks that power seamless digital experiences, crafted with precision and a human touch.

items.title: Flutter Engineering
items.description: Invisible precision that drives high-performance applications. We develop scalable, robust solutions tailored to complex digital ecosystems.

items.title: iOS & Android Native Development
items.description: We build solutions that leverage platform-specific capabilities, ensuring optimal speed, stability, and user experience while maintaining a cohesive brand presence across devices.

items.title: UX/UI Design
items.description: Our design process focuses on intuitive navigation, impactful visuals, and user flows that reduce friction while amplifying brand recognition.

items.title: Electronics, Firmware & IoT
items.description: We design and develop electronics, firmware, and IoT systems that integrate seamlessly with digital platforms, enabling intelligent products that communicate reliably, perform efficiently, and elevate user interaction with physical technology.

projects.title: Dealer Management Portal
projects.subtitle: A custom supply chain management platform for automotive dealers.
projects.pain: A leading firm in automotive sector had to build a unified digital interface for its dealer network limiting real-time communication, order tracking, shipment coordination, and post-sales management. Absence of an integrated system led to fragmented processes and reduced efficiency.
projects.solution:
Etere Studio contributed to deliver a custom-built supply chain management platform to unify client's dealer operations with real-time visibility and control.
Integrated communication layer for real-time inventory tracking across dealer network
Optimized order management workflows for end-to-end supply chain orchestration
Enterprise-grade performance, with secure data handling aligned to client's compliance and scalability standards
highlights: Integrated communication layer for real-time inventory tracking across dealer network
Optimized order management workflows for end-to-end supply chain orchestration
Enterprise-grade performance, with secure data handling aligned to client's compliance and scalability standards

projects.title: Vehicle Rental Portal
projects.subtitle: Distributed platform for vehicle rentals and telematics.
projects.pain: Iveco had to build integrated system to manage truck rentals, facing issues with fragmented lease reservations, limited visibility into vehicle status, and scattered communication. Off-the-shelf solutions failed to meet these combined needs efficiently.
projects.solution:
Etere Studio built a distributed, service-oriented platform to unify reservations, vehicle telemetry, and communication into a cohesive, scalable system.
Microservices structured for core domains: reservations, telematics, comms
Event-driven architecture enabling asynchronous, decoupled processing
IoT gateways feeding real-time vehicle data into a centralized telemetry pipeline
API-first design ensuring extensibility and seamless third-party integration
highlights: Microservices structured for core domains: reservations, telematics, comms
Event-driven architecture enabling asynchronous, decoupled processing
IoT gateways feeding real-time vehicle data into a centralized telemetry pipeline
API-first design ensuring extensibility and seamless third-party integration

projects.title: Vehicle management app
projects.subtitle: Bluetooth-enabled vehicle insights and insurance workflows.
projects.pain: Vodafone Automotive needed a mobile app with Bluetooth read/write capabilities to interface with in-vehicle systems, enabling claims assessment and real-time visibility into insured vehicle status—requiring robust connectivity, secure data handling, and seamless hardware integration.
projects.solution:
Etere Studio delivered a utility mobile tool for Vodafone Automotive to streamline black box interaction and insurance workflows.
Fast Bluetooth-based scanning and identification of in-vehicle devices
Guided configuration flow for black box setup and calibration
Intuitive interface optimized for insurance field agents
Automated data synchronization with insurance systems for real-time claims processing
highlights: Fast Bluetooth-based scanning and identification of in-vehicle devices
Guided configuration flow for black box setup and calibration
Intuitive interface optimized for insurance field agents
Automated data synchronization with insurance systems for real-time claims processing

projects.title: IoT Healthcare App
projects.subtitle: Real-time biosignal tracking for medical research.
projects.pain: A Harvard-incubated start-up needed an app to manage advanced biosignal devices, handling varied setups and preventing errors during real-time brain and body signal acquisition for sleep analysis.
projects.solution:
Etere Studio developed a device-integrated application to enable real-time biosignal monitoring with intelligent setup management and minimal error rates.
Real-time visualization and logging of neurological and physiological data via an intuitive interface
Adaptive signal optimization across heterogeneous medical hardware configurations
Dual-mode UI tailored for seamless use by clinicians and non-technical users alike
highlights: Real-time visualization and logging of neurological and physiological data via an intuitive interface
Adaptive signal optimization across heterogeneous medical hardware configurations
Dual-mode UI tailored for seamless use by clinicians and non-technical users alike

projects.title: Digital Banking App
projects.subtitle: Secure mobile banking and insurance access.
projects.pain: Banca Intesa San Paolo needed a secure, high-performance mobile platform for insurance and account management. Existing offered suboptimal user experience, and fell short on enterprise-grade security and compliance requirements.
projects.solution:
Etere Studio co-developed a secure, high-performance mobile app for Banca Intesa San Paolo, focused on enhancing digital banking and insurance operations. Our key project focus have been:
Access to insurance services and account management within a single UI
Native system integration for real-time banking data and transactional workflows
UX optimized for security, accessibility, and regulatory compliance
End-to-end encryption and secure session handling to safeguard user data
highlights: Access to insurance services and account management within a single UI
Native system integration for real-time banking data and transactional workflows
UX optimized for security, accessibility, and regulatory compliance
End-to-end encryption and secure session handling to safeguard user data

projects.title: Investment Management App
projects.subtitle: Interactive dashboards for portfolio tracking.
projects.pain: Bestinver required a modern, high-performance investment platform with an intuitive mobile experience for its clients. Existing tools lacked responsive UI, seamless portfolio visualization, and the flexibility to handle complex financial interactions across devices—impacting engagement and operational efficiency.
projects.solution:
Etere Studio contributed to Bestinver's platform by delivering a robust, Flutter-based frontend for responsive, high-quality investment interactions.
Consistent cross-platform experience with native-like performance using Flutter
Interactive dashboards for real-time portfolio tracking and fund operations
UX optimized for financial data visualization, ensuring clarity and usability
Secure API integration for transactions, market data, and account management
highlights: Consistent cross-platform experience with native-like performance using Flutter
Interactive dashboards for real-time portfolio tracking and fund operations
UX optimized for financial data visualization, ensuring clarity and usability
Secure API integration for transactions, market data, and account management

projects.title: Graphic Design App
projects.subtitle: Digital sketching tool for fashion houses with Apple Pencil integration.
projects.pain: Gucci needed a custom solution to integrate Apple Pencil and iPad into its design workflow. The lack of a unified platform hindered seamless sketching, real-time collaboration, and efficient sharing of design iterations across teams, slowing down the product development cycle.
projects.solution:
Etere Studio developed a specialized digital design platform for Gucci, integrating iPad and Apple Pencil into the fashion creation workflow.
High-precision Apple Pencil support for sketching and intricate detailing
Designer-centric UI for an intuitive, professional creative experience
Customizable brushes, textures, and layering tools for realistic digital rendering
Cloud-based synchronization to enable real-time sharing and cross-team collaboration
highlights: High-precision Apple Pencil support for sketching and intricate detailing
Designer-centric UI for an intuitive, professional creative experience
Customizable brushes, textures, and layering tools for realistic digital rendering
Cloud-based synchronization to enable real-time sharing and cross-team collaboration

projects.title: Sportsbook and Casino App
projects.subtitle: Scalable white-label betting platform.
projects.pain: Betting operators across Asia, Africa, and the EU required a scalable, white-label platform to deploy branded services rapidly. Existing solutions lacked modularity, seamless third-party integration, and the flexibility needed for fast, region-specific rollouts.
projects.solution:
Etere Studio engineered a large-scale, white-label sports betting platform built for global deployment and high concurrency.
Scalable architecture supporting millions of concurrent users with high availability
Fully customizable white-label framework for rapid brand onboarding
End-to-end Flutter development enabling a unified, high-performance cross-platform user experience
highlights: Scalable architecture supporting millions of concurrent users with high availability
Fully customizable white-label framework for rapid brand onboarding
End-to-end Flutter development enabling a unified, high-performance cross-platform user experience

projects.title: Operations Platform
projects.subtitle: Real-time taxi and ride-sharing coordination.
projects.pain: WeTaxi faced inefficiencies due to taxi bookings being manually coordinated and updated on website by staff. The lack of a driver-side app and real-time communication created delays in managing ride requests.
projects.solution:
Etere Studio developed the WeTaxi mobile platform to deliver an integrated experience for taxi booking, payments, and real-time ride-sharing.
Real-time GPS tracking for accurate driver-passenger coordination
Guided user flow for booking, fare calculation, and digital payments
Automated data sync for transaction history and fare validation
Live ride and route sharing for coordinated, multi-passenger journeys
highlights: Real-time GPS tracking for accurate driver-passenger coordination
Guided user flow for booking, fare calculation, and digital payments
Automated data sync for transaction history and fare validation
Live ride and route sharing for coordinated, multi-passenger journeys
